titleInfo.title: 'Memorandum on possible methods of Purchasing or Leasing the Islands in the Persian Gulf'

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: the foliation sequence commences and terminates at f 57, as it is part of a larger physical volume; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the bottom right corner of the recto side of each folio. Pagination: the item also contains an original printed pagination sequence.

mods.abstract: The memorandum outlines two forms by which islands in the Persian Gulf may be purchased from Persia, and three possible methods by which the islands may be leased instead; each proposal includes an estimate of the cost. It does not specify which islands the British hope to acquire by the proposed schemes.
